name: DEEMED-Demo
description:
DEEMED Demo

Controls: Mouse, Left click to move, right click to interact, left click on UI buttons or icon to activate menu or abilities.

Game Jam Theme "Leave Something behind" with modifier "Mouse-Only controls".

Prototype, has bugs and incomplete. Currently 2 Levels in demo to explore.

Equipment system unfinished, however backend of collection done, not displaying in UI currently or on hover for inventory items.
